import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './App.css'; function AuthorizationPage(props) { let accessCode = Math.floor(Math.random()*10000000000); let accessCodeInput = React.createRef(); function handleSubmit (event) { event.preventDefault(); if(parseInt(accessCodeInput.current.value) === accessCode){ props.setAccess(true); } } return (
This Portfolio is Restricted.
(Not really though... the access code is hidden somewhere in this website)
{accessCode}
Version:1.1.3 - Updated:6/11/20
) } function PortfolioPage() { return (
> Access Granted. Congrats!

Peter Glass

peter.glass@utdallas.edu, peterglass123@gmail.com

(737) 402-9521

Education

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (GPA: 3.86/4.00)
The University of Texas at Dallas, Richardson, Texas
Anticipated May 2021

Undeclared, Core Courses (GPA: 3.38/4.00)
The University of Texas at Austin, Austin, Texas
Sep 2017 – Dec 2018

Projects

Lambda Fuel Map (FSAE Club Project)
Sep 2019 – Dec 2019

  • Java Swing based application that maps lambda values from a log file to a table and then colors the cells based on the cell value
  • Worked in a group of four using an agile form of collaboration and GitHub (Repository Link)

Current Courses

  • Database Systems
  • Automata Theory
  • Computer Networks
  • Computer and Network Security

Work Experience

Office Assistant, UT OLLI Department, Austin, Texas
Sep 2017 – Dec 2018

  • Maintained the membership website, by updating posted events, accepting join request and managing member information
  • Worked with excel and word, which involved mail merging, making excel macros, and making word templates
  • Answered emails, phone calls and greet members who walked through our office

Warehouse Associate, Amazon, Austin, Texas
Jun – Sep 2018

  • Scanned packages that were coming off a conveyor belt and place them into their proper delivery bag
  • Sort packages on the conveyor belt so that scanners could more efficiently grab packages

Crew Member, Wendy’s, Austin, Texas
Jun – Sep 2017

  • Took customers’ orders through the drive-through and in the lobby
  • Created a welcoming atmosphere for customers

Skills

Java, C++, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, MIPS Assembly, Microsoft Office, SolidWorks, Autodesk Inventor, Critical Thinking, Communication, Teamwork, Customer Service

) } function App() { let [hasAccess, setAccess] = useState(false); return (
{!hasAccess && } {hasAccess && }
); } export default App;
